author: fhanik
msg: Blocking and non blocking is the only configuration option right now,
no need for the NO_IO option, as it can be controlled using the register/unregister options

msg: Fixes hard coded HTTP, which causes problems when running through HTTPS (see bug 42100)

author: nick
msg: Update Jakarta -> Apache in the build file, and update more of the site

author: mprudhom
msg: Updated the scm information in poms whose directories do not match their assembly names, which will hopefully fix one of the recent Continuum problems on vmbuild
